v8:item.v8:content: Error #
Error Name
Error Type
Description
Use Case
Error Message
Link Action
Next Action for CSR
STATUS_INVALID_GATHERER_REQUEST
Agent
Your request cannot be completed due to technical reasons. This error is usually resolved in a few days.
1. Please try again.
Please ask the consumer to retry. If the same error occurs again, follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee.
STATUS_NO_CONNECTION
Agent
This exception should only occur when an Agent times out.
Too many Item accounts result in a refresh lasting longer than is allotted.
The request timed out before completing due to delays beyond our control. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again.
1. Please try again.

Please ask the consumer to visit the host site by using the “Go to” or “Auto-login” feature and verify if the consumer is able to view all required information. If the site and all required information are available, please ask the consumer to refresh the account 60-90 seconds after the last refresh. If the problem persists, follow escalation procedures to Yodlee.
STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR
Agent

This general exception should be used when the Agent sees something it does not expect. This should be a catchall bucket until the problem can be granulized. If a required field is missing, a 413 should be thrown.
The Agent is unable to find a link it expects.

Problem Updating Account (403) We could not update your account due to unexpected variations at the {sum_info_name} site. This type of error is often resolved in a few days. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
Try again to initiate instant refresh
Please follow escalation procedures to Yodlee so Data Operations can debug the issue.
STATUS_GATHERER_LOST_REQUEST
Agent
This error occurs when the gatherer kicks off a request, but a response is never sent to the DBFiler.
Infinite Loop
Problem Updating Account (404) We could not update your account due to temporary technical difficulties. Please try again.
Try again to initiate instant refresh

Please ask the consumer to visit the host site by using the “Go to” or “Auto-login” feature and verify if the consumer is able to view all required information. If the site and all required information are available, please ask the consumer to refresh the account 60-90 seconds after the last refresh. If the problem persists, follow escalation procedures to Yodlee.
STATUS_NO_ITEMS_FAILURE
Agent
This occurs when a response block does not include at least one account for a tag
The Agent does not return a bank account for refresh request in the banking category.
Account Not Found (408) We could not find any accounts to update at the {sum_info_name} site. Please visit the site and login to confirm your account has been setup. Once done, please try again.
visit the site - links to base URL try again - initiates instant refresh
Please ask the consumer to follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee so Data Operations can debug the issue
STATUS_REQUIRED_FIELD_UNAVAILABLE
Agent
The Agent is looking for a required element that is not available at the end site. This may indicate a site change.
Required fields (as enforced by an Agent) sometimes change location depending upon an account type. In this case, the Agent should return a 413 error.

Problem Updating Account (413) We could not update your account due to unexpected variations at the {sum_info_name} site. This type of error is usually resolved in a few days. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
Try again to initiate instant refresh
Since this may indicate a site change, please follow escalation procedures to Yodlee so Data Operations can debug the issue.
STATUS_LOGIN_NOT_COMPLETED
Agent
This error will occur when there is a javascript alert when the Agent attempts to login. This will identify sites where the login parameters have changed.

A Login field has moved or the name has changed. The Agent is able to post 0 to n-1 parameters (where n is the required number of parameters) before clicking submit. Upon submit, the site pops up a JavaScript alert prompting the user to enter all require

Problem Updating Account (419) We could not update your account due to unexpected variations at the {sum_info_name} site. This type of error is often resolved in a few days. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
try again - initiates instant refresh
Please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee so Data Operations can modify the Agent and accommodate changes at the host site.
UNIQUEID_FROM_DATA_SOURCE_ERROR
Agent
Internal error while gathering data from the end site. This is a more granular version of 403.
Agent encounters an unexpected field.

Problem Updating Account (475) We could not update your account due to unexpected variations at the {sum_info_name} site. This type of error is often resolved in a few days. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
try again later - initiates an instant refresh
Follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee.
ACCOUNT_REQUIRED_FIELDS_NOT_SET
Agent
Internal error while gathering data from the end site. This is a more granular version of 403.
Agent encounters an unexpected field.

Problem Updating Account (476) We could not update your account due to unexpected variations at the {sum_info_name} site. This type of error is often resolved in a few days. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
try again later - initiates an instant refresh
Follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee.
STATUS_DBFILER_SUMMARY_SAVE_ERROR
Agent
This exception is thrown when there is a problem filing Item Summary data into the database.
There was a failure while attempting to write the response to the database, because, for example, the response data exceeded a column length in the DB.
Please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee to enable Data Operations for further investigation.
STATUS_OK
n/a
Successful refresh
When yodlee agent is able to successfully login to the FI site to gather data
(no message - refresh was successful)
Default Error
Default message (to be used if a message has not been explicitly defined for an error code.
n/a
Problem Updating Account We could not update your account due to technical reasons. This type of error is usually resolved in a few days. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
try again - initiates instant refresh
STATUS_SITE_UNAVAILABLE
Site

This is a CATCH ALL bucket for site unavailable errors. As new error codes are implemented, current 409s will be granulized into the new, expanded error code set. Eventually, this bucket will be phased out.
An Agent throws a res:// during after logging in, but it has not yet been updated to throw the proper error (a 423)
Problem Updating Account! (409) We could not update your account because the {sum_info_name} site is experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
Try again to initiate instant refresh

Please ask the consumer to log in to the end site directly and verify that they can view all of their account information. Also ensure the consumer can fully navigate the site. In most cases the error will not occur at login, therefore it is very important that the consumer navigates through the site. If the problem persists, follow escalation procedures to Yodlee.
STATUS_POP3_SERVER_FAILED
Site
This is used for connection errors with POP3 servers.
An email Agent attempts to connect to a POP3 and fails

Problem Updating Account! (410) We could not update your account due to technical reasons. This type of error is usually resolved in a few days. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
Try again to initiate instant refresh
Please ask the consumer to verify that they have specified the correct server name and port number.
STATUS_SITE_OUT_OF_BUSINESS
Site
This error is required for sites that are no longer offering web services. This error will be used to indicate to users that they should remove this account from their aggregated accounts.
Goodbye.com is no longer offering web access for its Loan Holders. Thank you for your patronage.
Site No Longer Available (411) The {sum_info_name} site no longer provides online services to its customers. Please deactivate or remove this account.
deactivate - links to deactivation confirmation page remove - links to remove confirmation page
Please ask the consumer to remove this account from their Yodlee service.
STATUS_SITE_APPLICATION_ERROR
Site
The site displays an application error message (“Out of Memory”, “Java Servlet Errors”, “VB Script Error”)
Java Servlet Error
Problem Updating Account (412) We could not update your account because the {sum_info_name} site was experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
Try again to initiate instant refresh
Please ask the consumer to follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee so Data Operations can debug the issue.
STATUS_SITE_TERMINATED_SESSION
Site
To be used when a host site has terminated the session arbitrarily.
Citibank occasionally throws a “session has been terminated” error during Agent navigation
Problem Updating Account (415) We could not update your account because the {sum_info_name} site was experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again.
Try again to initiate instant refresh
Please request the consumer to refresh the account after sometime.
STATUS_HTTP_DNS_ERROR_EXCEPTION
Site
This error code will be used to message end users that a site is not available because there was a res:// DNS error.
We try to do a get on the login URL, and we receive a Res:// DNS error instead.
Problem Updating Account (418) We could not update your account because the {sum_info_name} site was experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
try again - initiates instant refresh

Please request the consumer to verify if the host site is available and they able to navigate through the site and view all required account information. If they are unable to navigate and view account information, please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee.
STATUS_ACCT_INFO_UNAVAILABLE
Site
The Agent is looking for a required account that is not available at the end site. This may indicate a problem on the end site.
A user has a proper account, but the data source is reporting the information for that account is unavailable

No Account Found (423) We were unable to detect an account. Please verify that your account information is unavailable at this time and try again. If the problem persists, please contact customer support at {sum_info_name} for further assistance.
try again - initiates instant refresh contact customer support - links to the customer support URL or the base URL at the site

Please ask the consumer to try again after sometime since these problems are often transient and unpredictable. If the issue persist, as the consumer to verify the required information is available at the end site. If this is available, please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee.
STATUS_SITE_DOWN_FOR_MAINTENANCE
Site
Error for when sites indicates web servers are down for maintenance
Bank of America website is down from 2am – 5am EST every Saturday

Site Down for Maintenance (424) We are unable to update your account as the {sum_info_id} is temporarily down for maintenance. We apologize for the inconvenience. This problem is typically resolved in a few hours so please try again later.
Please request the consumer to retry the account when the host site is available. Most maintenance windows are less than a few hours long.
STATUS_CERTIFICATE_ERROR
Site
Indicates if there is a certificate error on the site preventing secure login.
End site pops up an invalid certificate message
Problem Updating Account (425) We could not update your account because the {sum_info_name} site was experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
try again - initiates instant refresh
Please ask the consumer to try again at a later time. If the problem persists, please escalate to Yodlee so that Data Operations can investigate.
STATUS_SITE_BLOCKING
Site
This error is thrown whenever a site is blocking a Gatherer
Bank ABC blocks our cache run.

Problem Updating Account (426) We could not update your account due to technical difficulties. This problem is typically resolved within a few days. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
try again - initiates instant refresh

Occasionally, a site will block Yodlee Agents from accessing their system. When this occurs, Yodlee Data Operations negotiates with the end site for a quick resolution. When the end site has blocked the service, Yodlee will be unable to access the site. Therefore, please ask the consumer to check their account periodically to confirm when the block is removed.
STATUS_HTTP_FILE_NOT_FOUND_EXCEPTION
Site
This error code will be used to message end users that a site is not available because there was a res:// FILE NOT FOUND error
Site throws a FILE NOT FOUND error
Problem Updating Account (431) We could not update your account because the {sum_info_name} site was experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
try again - initiates instant refresh

Please ask the consumer to verify if they can log into the host site. If the site is unavailable, please recommend that they try again later. If they can successfully login and the error persists, please request the login URL used and escalate to Yodlee so that Data Operations can investigate.
STATUS_HTTP_INTERNAL_ERROR_EXCEPTION
Site
This error code will be used to message end users that a site is not available because there was a res:// INTERNAL SERVER ERROR.
Email.com is an unreliable site. Site throws an Internal Server Error.
Problem Updating Account (432) We could not update your account because the {sum_info_name} site was experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
try again - initiates instant refresh

Please ask the consumer to verify if they can log into the host site. If the site is unavailable, please recommend that they try again later. If they can successfully login and the error persists, please request the login URL used and escalate to Yodlee so that Data Operations can investigate.
STATUS_LOGIN_FAILED
UAR
This exception should only occur when the stored user credentials are incorrect. This requires the accurate setting of failstrings for each individual data source.
A user changes their password at the end site, but fails to update it on a Cobrand site.

A 402 error indicates that the user’s credentials need to be reverified. The consumer will need to log in to the site, verify the credentials and ensure that the same credentials are submitted to Yodlee. There is no workaround for this issue if the consumer has submitted the wrong credentials.

1. Some sites require additional passwords for some consumers, including, for example, the last 4 digits of the Social Security Number. If the site prompts for special passwords only for a few consumers, then the Yodlee powered application does not make it a mandatory credential and the consumer can ignore the prompt. However, when the script tries to log in and finds that the site asks for additional fields that it does not have, a 402 error appears. 2. We have a rate of 0.1 to 0.2% of false 402s when the agent attempts to log in, but the site shows an invalid credentials message although the credentials are valid. The consumer can try refreshing the account. 3. 402s can also happen because of data related issues. For example, an instance when the agent tries to submit the page without actually filling in the credentials. This does not have a workaround and the consumer should not try to update more than once since invalid attempts can lock the account. 4. Multifactor authentication, where the consumer needs to select security questions and provide answers, has to be consistent with the Yodlee login attempt. A successful Yodlee login needs all security questions answered correctly for every login attempt.

1) Ask the consumer to check whether the credentials/security questions given in the Yodlee application are exactly the same as specified in the end site. 2) Use the “Auto-login”/”Go to” feature for the affected site. This will ensure that the end user is redirected to the supported login page. 3) Please request the consumer to verify the login URL. The login URL should be the same as the one that Yodlee supports. 4) If the credentials/login URL are correct, follow escalation procedures to Yodlee with the auto-login result.
STATUS_USER_ABORTED_REQUEST
UAR
User interrupted the information gathering process.
User clicks “Stop Refresh”
Update Request Cancelled (405) Your account was not updated because you cancelled the request. Please try again.
Try again to initiate instant refresh
Please ask the consumer to retry. If the same error occurs again, follow escalation procedures to Yodlee.
STATUS_PASSWORD_EXPIRED
UAR

This should be a CATCH ALL bucket for navigation errors. As new error codes are implemented, current 406s should be granulized into the new, expanded error code set. Eventually, this bucket will be phased out.
End site is requesting user to accept new terms & conditions page, but the Agent has not yet been updated to throw the proper error (a 428)

Problem Updating Account (406) We could not update your account because the {sum_info_name} site requires you to perform some additional action. Please visit the site or contact their customer support to resolve this issue. Once done, please try again.
visit the site - links to base URL try again - initiates instant refresh

Please ask the consumer to log in to the end site and verify that the consumer has made the necessary corrections/verifications to their account. Also, confirm if the consumer can view all of their account information, such as account balances and transactions. Possibilities could include an expired password, a new updated password, mailing preferences or new Terms and Conditions. Once this has been completed make any necessary changes to the accounts settings within the Yodlee service. If the problem persists follow escalation procedures to Yodlee.
STATUS_ACCOUNT_LOCKED
UAR
This error occurs when a user’s account has been locked due to several invalid attempts to access their account information.
User has forgotten password, and guesses wrong 5 times, locking their account. May require a call to customer service to have the account unlocked.

Account Locked (407) We could not update your account because it appears your {sum_info_name} account has been locked. This usually results from too many unsuccessful login attempts in a short period of time. Please visit the site or contact their customer support to resolve this issue. Once done, please try again.
visit the site - links to base URL try again - initiates instant refresh

Please ask the consumer to contact the bank (end site) and follow the appropriate procedures at the affected institution so their account is unlocked. Once this is done, ask the consumer to make the necessary changes to their account settings within the Yodlee service. If this is not done, the consumer will usually receive a 402 after their account has been unlocked at the end site. Please proceed to the 402 troubleshooting steps for this type of situation.
STATUS_NO_ACCT_FOUND
UAR

This is for bank, credit card, and investment sites that offer more than one kind of account, but the user has not signed up for. For example, a user adds a bank site for a company where they only have an investment account.

A user has a Bank of America Credit Card account. The user searches for “Bank of America” and mistakenly clicks on “Bank of America” banking site. The Agent would notice there were no banking accounts available at the site and throw a 414 error

Requested Account Type Not Found (414) We could not find your requested account at the {sum_info_name} site. You may have selected a similar site under a different category by accident, in which case you should select the correct site.
select the correct site - links to add account flow

Please ensure that the consumer has added the account under the correct Category > Classification. If the consumer has added the account under the correct category (i.e. Deposit account under Banking), then please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee.
STATUS_SITE_SESSION_ALREADY_ESTABLISHED
UAR
If someone has already logged into the account or tries to do a refresh while someone else has already logged in (or a refresh is in progress).

PayMyWater throws up a window stating that the user’s session has already been established if someone else is logged into the account at the same time, or if a user closes their browser window without logging out.

Multiple User Logins (416) We attempted to update your account, but another session was already established at the same time. If you are currently logged on to this account directly, please log off and try again.
Try again to initiate instant refresh

Please ensure that the consumer is not logged in or attempting to log in to the host site while the account is being refreshed. If the consumer has logged in, ensure that they use the log out procedures (i.e. log out button), then attempt to refresh their account again. Please keep in mind that if logged out improperly, some web sites will not allow another session until the old one is no longer valid.
STATUS_DATA_MODEL_NO_SUPPORT
UAR
This error will be thrown when a user attempts to add an account for which the Yodlee data model does not have data support.
A user may add an Executive Stock Option account to their Investments site but the current data model does not support this type of account.
Account Not Supported (417) The type of account we found is not currently supported. Please remove this site and add as a manual account.
remove this site - links to remove confirmation page manual account - links to manual account add page
Please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee so the Data Operations team can investigate the possibility of supporting this account.
STATUS_SITE_MERGED_ERROR
UAR
This error will be thrown when a site has merged with a second site, and users are required to update their credentials.
Wachovia buys First Union. First Union customers are prompted to utilize the Wachovia website. However, a new set of login credentials is required at the Wachovia site.
Credential Re-Verification Required (420) The {sum_info_name} site has merged with another. Please re-verify your credentials at the site, update them, and try again.
update them- links to edit site page try again - initiates instant refresh

1) Please ask the consumer to verify whether they are able to login with the Yodlee login URL. If yes, please file a bug against Yodlee. 2) If the login url is different from that of Yodlee, please ask the consumer to add under correct site. 3) If the consumer is not able to find the site, file a bug against Yodlee. This may become a new site request.
STATUS_UNSUPPORTED_LANGUAGE_ERROR
UAR
This error is thrown when an Agent accesses a site where the default language for the user is not English.

Hotmail supports multiple languages for its users. User attempts to aggregate hotmail when their user default is set to Chinese. The Agent needs to notify the user that Yodlee does not currently support languages other than English.

Invalid Language Setting (421) The language setting for your {sum_info_name} account is not English. Please visit the {sum_info_name} site and change the language setting to English. Once done, please try again.
try again - initiates instant refresh
Yodlee currently does not support sites in which the default language is not English. Please ask the consumer to set the default language preference to English or remove this site from the service.
STATUS_ACCOUNT_CANCELLED
UAR
When an account has been closed, cancelled, has become inactive, etc, and shows as such on the site.
A user cancels their American Express credit card. The user’s login credentials remain active, however the site returns a message stating they no longer have any valid credit card accounts.
Account Reported Closed (422) We were unable to update your account information because {sum_info_name} has reported that your account has been cancelled. Please deactivate or remove your account.
deactivate - links to deactivation confirmation page remove - links to remove confirmation page

Please ask the consumer to verify if the host site is currently showing their account as closed, cancelled, inactive, etc. If the account is in any of the given status, please ask the consumer to remove the account.
STATUS_SPLASH_PAGE_EXCEPTION
UAR

This error will be thrown when an Agent encounters a new page, such as a splash page that is highlighting a new service. Note that as of 6.0.1 the Agents automatically click through these pages, so this may be considered an Agent error (and not a UAR).
A site is promoting a Bill Pay service that splashes a new page that requires the user to click through. As of 6.01, Yodlee policy is to click through on the user’s behalf.

Re-Verification Required (427) We could not update your account due to the {sum_info_id} site requiring you to view a new promotion. Please login to the site and click through to your account overview page and try again to update the account. We apologize for the inconvenience.
login to the site - links to the base URL of the site try again - initiates instant refresh

Please ask the consumer to visit the host site and acknowledge the promotion/request. In most cases this will clear the splash page. Should this be a reoccurring page and there is no end user interaction necessary to clear the page. Please escalate to Yodlee so that Data Operations can investigate.
STATUS_TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS_EXEPTION
UAR
This error will be thrown when a site is prompting its users to agree to a new terms & conditions page.
Bank of America has changed its privacy policy. Users must log in and accept the new policy before accessing their data.

Re-Verification Required (428). We could not update your account due to the {sum_info_id} site requiring you to accept a new Terms & Conditions. Please login to the site and read and accept the T&C. When done, please try again to update the account. We apologize for the inconvenience.
login to the site - links to the base URL of the site try again - initiates instant refresh

Please ask the consumer to visit the host site and complete the request to verify the new T&C. This request may occur after login or while navigating through the site. Therefore, request the consumer navigate to view their account details. Should this be a reoccurring request and there is no end user interaction necessary to clear the page, please escalate to Yodlee so that Data Operations can investigate.
STATUS_UPDATE_INFORMATION_EXCEPTION
UAR
This error will be thrown when a site is prompting its users to update their personal information.
A site is requesting a user to confirm their email address.

Re-Verification Required (429) We could not update your account due to the {sum_info_id} site requiring you to verify your personal information. Please login to the site and update the fields required. When done, please try again to update the account. We apologize for the inconvenience.
login to the site - links to the base URL of the site try again - initiates instant refresh

Please ask the consumer to visit the end site and complete the request to update/verify their profile information. This request may occur after login or while navigating through the site. Therefore request the consumer to login to the end site and view their account information, such as balances and transaction, as the request may occur while attempting to view account details.
STATUS_SITE_NOT_SUPPORTED
UAR
This error code will be used to message end users that Yodlee no longer supports a particular web site.
Yodlee makes a decision not to support a particular site, and disables it, causing all users who have added the site to see an error.
Site No Longer Support (430) This site is no longer supported for data updates. Please deactivate or remove this account. We apologize for the inconvenience.
deactivate - links to deactivation confirmation page remove - links to remove confirmation page
Please inform the consumer that the site is no longer supported by Yodlee service and should be removed.
Agent
This error is thrown when there is a mismatch in the length of meta-fields.

Check with the consumer to validate if the credentials provided are correct and they are able to login at the end site. If yes, then submit a service request with the Login URL where in the consumer is able to log in successfully manually.
Agent
This error is thrown when there is a mismatch in the meta-fields.
Please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee to enable Data Operations for further investigation.
REFRESH_NEVER_DONE
n/a
This error is thrown when a refresh has never been done for the item.
This status is returned when the Refresh status is queried right after adding an account (before refresh is complete and filed to the database).
Account Never Updated (801) This account has never been updated. Please try now.
try now - initiates instant refresh
SITE_CURRENTLY_NOT_SUPPORTED
UAR
Site Not Supported (505)
Yodlee does not currently support the security system used by this site. We apologize for any inconvenience. Check back periodically if this situation has changed. (remove this site).
(remove this site): Delete Account
Currently Yodlee does not support the site due to the enhanced security system.
NEW_LOGIN_INFO_REQUIRED_FOR_SITE
UAR
New login information Required (506)

To log in to this site, you need to supply additional information, like the answer to a security question. Please click here and supply additional information that has been requested so your account information can be updated automatically. (remove this site)
click here: Edit {sum_info} Site Settings Page - remove site - Delete Account

Ask the consumer to update the additional information required (mostly security questions) for login on the "Edit Site" page with the same information that the consumer has provided at the end site during enrollment. If the consumer is still facing the problem, follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee.
BETA_SITE_WORK_IN_PROGRESS
Agent
Problem Updating Account (507)

Yodlee has recently started providing data updates at this site and it may take a few days for information to successfully update for this account. We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please try again later.
try again: initiates instant refresh
Please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee so that Data Operations can investigate.
INSTANT_REQUEST_TIMEDOUT
Agent
Use default error message
Use default error message
use default error message and link action
Ask the consumer to retry after sometime. If the error persists, follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee.
TOKEN_ID_INVALID
UAR
Site Device Information expired (509).
Yodlee could not update your account because the device information you provided is no longer valid at the site. Update now. (remove this site)
Update now: javascript pop-up displaying the varying field and update button - Remove this site - Delete Account

Ask the consumer to retry and provide the token value within the specified time. If the error still persists, follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee. (This type of errors has to be addressed within 2 days of its occurrence to resolve the issue).
GENERAL_EXCEPTION_WHILE_GATHERING_MFA_DATA
Agent - Yes
General Exception While Gathering MFA data
General Exception.
Problem Updating Account (517): Yodlee MoneyCenter could not update your account for technical reasons. This type of error is often resolved in a few days. Please try again later.
Try again-> initiate MFA refresh
Please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee.
NEW_MFA_INFO_REQUIRED_FOR_AGENTS
UAR - No
New MFA Info Required

While performing cache refresh, end site has prompted for new additional security credentials and these credentials were not available in the database. e.g. Answer for the new security question prompted by end site is not available.
Re-verification Required (518): The additional security information is incomplete or incorrect. Please update your account settings with correct credentials.
Update your account -> Edit site settings

Ask the consumer to do an instant refresh (or update the credentials on edit site page) and if still the error persists, please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee. (This type of errors has to be addressed within 2 days of its occurrence to resolve the issue).
MFA_INFO_NOT_PROVIDED_TO_YODLEE_BY_USER_FOR_AGENTS
UAR - No
MFA Information not provided to Yodlee by user
While performing refresh for accounts of persistent MFA sites, system finds that the question or the answer is not available.
Manual Update Required (519): Please update this account as security credentials are required to log in to this site.
Update your account -> Edit site settings

Ask the consumer to do an instant refresh (or update the credentials on edit site page) and if the error persists, please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee (This type of errors has to be addressed within 2 days of its occurrence to resolve the issue).
MFA_INFO_MISMATCH_FOR_AGENTS
UAR - No
MFA Information Mismatch
While performing refresh for accounts of persistent MFA sites or while performing cache refresh for dynamic MFA sites, system finds that the additional security credentials available is incorrect.
Re-verification Required (520): The additional security information is incorrect. Please update your account settings with correct credentials.
Update your account -> Edit site settings

MFA information provided seems to be incorrect. Please ask the consumer to update the additional information at the end site and do an instant refresh. If the error persists, please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee. (This type of errors has to be addressed within 2 days of its occurrence to resolve the issue).
ENROLL_IN_MFA_AT_SITE
UAR- No
Update MFA Information at Site
End site has moved recently to MFA. User is asked to set the additional credentials at the end site and the Yodlee application.

Credentials Required (521): {account_provider's_ site} has introduced a security authentication system. Please visit the site to provide the requested information. Once done, update your account settings in Yodlee MoneyCenter.
Account provider’s site - > link to site. Update your account -> Edit site settings

The end site is asking the consumer to enroll for new login procedure. Please ask the consumer to enroll for it. If this is not the case and the agent is incorrectly throwing this error, please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee.
MFA_INFO_NOT_PROVIDED_IN_REAL_TIME_BY_USER_VIA_APP
UAR - No
MFA Information Not Provided

User is asked to provide the additional security credentials for refreshing the account and the credentials are not provided by the user within timeout period. User clicks "Update" link for refreshing the account and new security questions prompted by the end site. The refresh fails with this error code.
Request Timed Out (522): Your request has timed out as the required security information was not provided within the given time. Please try again.
Try again -> Initiate MFA request

The consumer has not provided the additional information required at the required time. Please ask the consumer to update again and provide the additional information within the time shown at the time of refresh. If this is not the case and the agent is incorrectly throwing this error, please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee. (This type of errors has to be addressed within 2 days of its occurrence to resolve the issue).
INVALID_MFA_INFO_IN_REAL_TIME_BY_USER_VIA_APP
UAR - No
Incorrect MFA Information
User is asked to provide the additional security credentials for refreshing the account. User provides incorrect credentials.
Invalid Credentials (523): The additional security information provided is incorrect. Please try again.
Try again -> Initiate MFA request

MFA information provided seems to be incorrect. Please ask the consumer to do an instant refresh again. Provide correct answer and if error persists, please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee. (This type of errors has to be addressed within 2 days of its occurrence to resolve the issue).
USER_PROVIDED_REAL_TIME_MFA_DATA_EXPIRED
UAR- No
MFA Data Expired
User is asked to provide the additional security credentials for refreshing the account. User provides credentials and end site finds that the Token ID has expired.
Credentials Expired (524): The additional security information you provided has expired. Please try again.
Try again -> Initiate MFA request

The Image/Token value got expired. Please ask the consumer to refresh again and if the refresh fails again, please follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee. (This type of errors has to be addressed within 2 days of its occurrence to resolve the issue).
INSTANT_REQUEST_TIMEDOUT_GATHERER
Site - Yes
Request timed out since gatherer did not send the response to application typically since the site is slow
Application didn’t receive response from the end site within the expected cut off time.
Request Timed Out (525): Your request has timed out due to technical reasons. Please try again.
Try again -> Initiate MFA request
Ask the user to retry after sometime. If the error persists, follow the escalation procedures to Yodlee.
